text: Eric David Cantú Guerrero (born 28 February 1999) is a Mexican footballer who plays as a defender for Monterrey. ==Honours== ===Club=== ;Monterrey *Liga MX: Apertura 2019 ==References== ==External links== *Eric Cantú at Official Liga MX Profile *Eric Cantú at Flashscore *Eric Cantú at Soccerway *Eric Cantú at MedioTiempo *Eric Cantú at Fichajes Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican footballers Category:Mexico international footballers Category:Footballers from Nuevo León Category:Association football defenders Category:C.F. title: Eric Cantú
